content: Connect with your local represenatives and state government to potentially have the opportunity to become a delegate.
You shouldn't need to contact your reps and state government to become a delegate
It's a party thing
Oh wow! I never thought of doing that. Connecting with your representative really gets you further than people think
I'd check with your local county / district party
And get involved
I don't know too much about it but I remember there being a form for it
Since each congressional district votes within the party to select a number of delegates with the goal of fulfilling certain diversity quotas (but not required)
Wish I attended the historical convention but I would be equally happy going to the convention of Harris' reelection ðŸ‘€
You can also run as an at-large delegate that gets voted on by all of the district delegates after applying and the presidential campaign selecting a potential list
And there are party leader spots, but that's usually reserved for actual politicians or party chairs
At least, this was the process in Florida when I ran to be a delegate
My local rep and state government was not involved, and this was only run by the internal party

But connect with your rep anyway
It's generally useful if they're in your party
Somewhat useful if they're Republican
Not for becoming a delegate in my opinion though
What does it mean to actually *run* for a Delegate? Does an actual election get held for it?

Yes
There's a small election of registered party members
For both district and at-large delegates
At-large delegates are delegates assigned to the state but no particular congressional district
It could entirely differ in a different state,.but this was the method used in the state of Florida
And it could entirely differ if the bylaws passed at the convention this year just upended everything,.but this is generally how it worked
I see
I'm gonna keep this in mind for the next election
So I'd get close to your local parties and make your name known if you want to
Or just hop onto a slate because people do that
I really want to attend the convention and see the greatests on stage!

Oh you can just go there
It's open to the public 
Just not the floor

There's a ton of DNC caucus meetings also going on
The AAPI caucus chair really wanted me to go and meet her
Oh wow!
Did you?

I did not because I really didn't feel like spending the money and time going to chicago just to visit lol

Expensive, and I'm low on vacation days ðŸ¤·
